dongGoi: Hộp 2 vỉ x 5 viên, hộp 1 chai 50 viên
taDuoc: Croscarmellose sodium, Tinh bột ngô, Povidon, Pregelatinized starch, Colloidal silicon dioxide, Magnesi stearat, Ethanol 96%, Hydroxypropylmethylcellulose, Titanium dioxide, Polyethylene glycol 6000, Polysorbate 80, Talc, màu Tartazine, Acid citric, Sodium citrate
